headline: TKO Declares Fourth Quarter 2025 Dividend
summary: NEW YORK, December 04, 2025--TKO Group Holdings, Inc. (NYSE: TKO) ("TKO" or the "Company"), a premium sports and entertainment company, today announced that its board of directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend pursuant to which TKO’s Class A common stockholders will receive their pro rata share of an aggregate distribution of approximately $150 million from TKO Operating Company, LLC to its equityholders. The per share dividend to the holders of TKO’s Class A common stockholders will be
